verses.verse: שִׁ֥יר <WH7892> shir The song הַשִּׁירִ֖ים <WH7892> hash-shi-Rim of songs אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which לִשְׁלֹמֹֽה׃ <WH8010> lish-lo-Moh. which [is] Solomon's

יִשָּׁקֵ֙נִי֙ <WH5401> yish-sha-Ke-ni Let him kiss מִנְּשִׁיק֣וֹת <WH5390> min-ne-shi-Kot me with the kisses פִּ֔יהוּ <WH6310> Pi-hu, of his mouth כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for טוֹבִ֥ים <WH2896> to-Vim [is] better דֹּדֶ֖יךָ <WH1730> do-Dei-cha for thy love מִיָּֽיִן׃ <WH3196> mi-Ya-yin. than wine

לְרֵ֙יחַ֙ <WH7381> le-Rei-ach Because of the savour שְׁמָנֶ֣יךָ <WH8081> she-ma-Nei-cha ointments טוֹבִ֔ים <WH2896> to-Vim, of thy good שֶׁ֖מֶן <WH8081> She-men [is as] ointment תּוּרַ֣ק <WH7324> tu-Rak poured forth שְׁמֶ֑ךָ <WH8034> she-Me-cha; thy name עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and כֵּ֖ן <WH3651> ken after that עֲלָמ֥וֹת <WH5959> a-la-Mot therefore do the virgins אֲהֵבֽוּךָ׃ <WH157> 'a-he-Vu-cha. love

מָשְׁכֵ֖נִי <WH4900> ma-she-Che-ni Draw אַחֲרֶ֣יךָ <WH310> 'a-cha-Rei-cha after נָּר֑וּצָה <WH7323> na-Ru-tzah; me we will run הֱבִיאַ֨נִי <WH935> he-vi-'A-ni hath brought הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech thee the king חֲדָרָ֗יו <WH2315> cha-da-Rav, me into his chambers נָגִ֤ילָה <WH1523> na-Gi-lah we will be glad וְנִשְׂמְחָה֙ <WH8055> ve-nis-me-Chah and rejoice בָּ֔ךְ Bach, נַזְכִּ֤ירָה <WH2142> naz-Ki-rah in thee we will remember דֹדֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH1730> do-Dei-cha thy love מִיַּ֔יִן <WH3196> mi-Ya-yin, more than wine מֵישָׁרִ֖ים <WH4339> mei-sha-Rim the upright אֲהֵבֽוּךָ׃ <WH157> 'a-he-Vu-cha. love ס sa-Mek

שְׁחוֹרָ֤ה <WH7838> she-cho-Rah I [am] black אֲנִי֙ <WH589> 'a-Ni I וְֽנָאוָ֔ה <WH5000> ve-na-Vah, but comely בְּנ֖וֹת <WH1323> be-Not O ye daughters יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim; of Jerusalem כְּאָהֳלֵ֣י <WH168> ke-'o-ho-Lei as the tents קֵדָ֔ר <WH6938> ke-Dar, of Kedar כִּירִיע֖וֹת <WH3407> ki-ri-'ot as the curtains שְׁלֹמֹֽה׃ <WH8010> she-lo-Moh. of Solomon

אַל־ <WH408> 'al- not תִּרְא֙וּנִי֙ <WH7200> tir-'U-ni Look שֶׁאֲנִ֣י <WH589> she-'a-Ni I שְׁחַרְחֹ֔רֶת <WH7840> she-char-Cho-ret, not upon me because I [am] black שֶׁשֱּׁזָפַ֖תְנִי <WH7805> shesh-she-za-Fat-ni hath looked הַשָּׁ֑מֶשׁ <WH8121> hash-Sha-mesh; because the sun בְּנֵ֧י <WH1121> be-Nei children אִמִּ֣י <WH517> 'im-Mi upon me my mother's נִֽחֲרוּ־ <WH2787> ni-cha-ru- were angry בִ֗י Vi, שָׂמֻ֙נִי֙ <WH7760> sa-Mu-ni with me they made נֹטֵרָ֣ה <WH5201> no-te-Rah me the keeper אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַכְּרָמִ֔ים <WH3754> hak-ke-ra-Mim, of the vineyards כַּרְמִ֥י <WH3754> kar-Mi [but] mine own vineyard שֶׁלִּ֖י shel-Li לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo have not נָטָֽרְתִּי׃ <WH5201> na-Ta-re-ti. have I not kept

הַגִּ֣ידָה <WH5046> hag-Gi-dah Tell לִּ֗י Li, שֶׁ֤אָהֲבָה֙ <WH157> she-'a-ha-vah loveth נַפְשִׁ֔י <WH5315> naf-Shi, me O thou whom my soul אֵיכָ֣ה <WH349> 'ei-Chah where תִרְעֶ֔ה <WH7462> tir-'Eh, where thou feedest אֵיכָ֖ה <WH349> 'ei-Chah how תַּרְבִּ֣יץ <WH7257> tar-Bitz thou makest [thy flock] to rest בַּֽצָּהֳרָ֑יִם <WH6672> batz-tzo-ho-Ra-yim; at noon שַׁלָּמָ֤ה <WH4100> shal-la-Mah for אֶֽהְיֶה֙ <WH1961> 'eh-Yeh become כְּעֹ֣טְיָ֔ה <WH5844> ke-'O-te-Yah, why should I be as one that turneth aside עַ֖ל <WH5921> 'al Beside עֶדְרֵ֥י <WH5739> 'ed-Rei by the flocks חֲבֵרֶֽיךָ׃ <WH2270> cha-ve-Rei-cha. companion

אִם־ <WH518> 'im- If לֹ֤א <WH3808> lo not תֵדְעִי֙ <WH3045> te-de-'I If thou know לָ֔ךְ Lach, הַיָּפָ֖ה <WH3303> hai-ya-Fah not O thou fairest בַּנָּשִׁ֑ים <WH802> ban-na-Shim; among women צְֽאִי־ <WH3318> tze-'i- go thy way forth לָ֞ךְ lach בְּעִקְבֵ֣י <WH6119> be-'ik-Vei by the footsteps הַצֹּ֗אן <WH6629> hatz-Tzon, of the flock וּרְעִי֙ <WH7462> u-re-'I and feed אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- גְּדִיֹּתַ֔יִךְ <WH1429> ge-di-yo-Ta-yich, thy kids עַ֖ל <WH5921> 'al By מִשְׁכְּנ֥וֹת <WH4908> mish-ke-Not tents הָרֹעִֽים׃ <WH7462> ha-ro-'Im. beside the shepherds' ס sa-Mek

לְסֻסָתִי֙ <WH5484> le-su-sa-Ti to a company of horses בְּרִכְבֵ֣י <WH7393> be-rich-Vei chariots פַרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> far-'Oh, in Pharaoh's דִּמִּיתִ֖יךְ <WH1819> dim-mi-Tich I have compared רַעְיָתִֽי׃ <WH7474> ra'-ya-Ti. thee O my love

נָאו֤וּ <WH4998> na-Vu are comely לְחָיַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH3895> le-cha-Ya-yich Thy cheeks בַּתֹּרִ֔ים <WH8447> bat-to-Rim, with rows צַוָּארֵ֖ךְ <WH6677> tzav-va-Rech [of jewels] thy neck בַּחֲרוּזִֽים׃ <WH2737> ba-cha-ru-Zim. with chains

תּוֹרֵ֤י <WH8447> to-Rei thee borders זָהָב֙ <WH2091> za-Hav of gold נַעֲשֶׂה־ <WH6213> na-'a-seh- We will make לָּ֔ךְ Lach, עִ֖ם <WH5973> 'im With נְקֻדּ֥וֹת <WH5351> ne-kud-Dot with studs הַכָּֽסֶף׃ <WH3701> hak-Ka-sef. of silver

עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- While שֶׁ֤הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> she-ham-Me-lech While the king בִּמְסִבּ֔וֹ <WH4524> bim-sib-Bo, [sitteth] at his table נִרְדִּ֖י <WH5373> nir-Di my spikenard נָתַ֥ן <WH5414> na-Tan sendeth forth רֵיחֽוֹ׃ <WH7381> rei-Cho. the smell

צְר֨וֹר <WH6872> tze-Ror A bundle הַמֹּ֤ר׀ <WH4753> ham-Mor of myrrh דּוֹדִי֙ <WH1730> do-Di [is] my wellbeloved לִ֔י Li, בֵּ֥ין <WH996> bein between שָׁדַ֖י <WH7699> sha-Dai all night betwixt my breasts יָלִֽין׃ <WH3885> ya-Lin. unto me he shall lie

אֶשְׁכֹּ֨ל <WH811> 'esh-Kol [is] unto me [as] a cluster הַכֹּ֤פֶר׀ <WH3724> hak-Ko-fer of camphire דּוֹדִי֙ <WH1730> do-Di My beloved לִ֔י Li, בְּכַרְמֵ֖י <WH3754> be-char-Mei in the vineyards עֵ֥ין 'ein גֶּֽדִי׃ <WH5872> Ge-di. of Engedi ס sa-Mek

הִנָּ֤ךְ <WH2005> hin-Nach behold יָפָה֙ <WH3303> ya-Fah Behold thou [art] fair רַעְיָתִ֔י <WH7474> ra'-ya-Ti, my love הִנָּ֥ךְ <WH2005> hin-Nach behold יָפָ֖ה <WH3303> ya-Fah behold thou [art] fair עֵינַ֥יִךְ <WH5869> 'ei-Na-yich eyes יוֹנִֽים׃ <WH3123> yo-Nim. thou [hast] doves'

הִנְּךָ֨ <WH2005> hin-ne-Cha behold יָפֶ֤ה <WH3303> ya-Peh Behold thou [art] fair דוֹדִי֙ <WH1730> do-Di my beloved אַ֣ף <WH637> 'af so נָעִ֔ים <WH5273> na-'Im, yea pleasant אַף־ <WH637> 'af- Indeed עַרְשֵׂ֖נוּ <WH6210> 'ar-Se-nu also our bed רַעֲנָנָֽה׃ <WH7488> ra-'a-na-Nah. [is] green

קֹר֤וֹת <WH6982> ko-Rot The beams בָּתֵּ֙ינוּ֙ <WH1004> bat-Tei-nu of our house אֲרָזִ֔ים <WH730> 'a-ra-Zim, [are] cedar; רַחִיטֵנוּ ra-chi-te-nu כרַהִיטֵ֖נוּ <WH7351> ra-hi-Te-nu rafter קבְּרוֹתִֽים׃ <WH1266> be-ro-Tim. of fir
